biotools.summary: Functions necessary to perform Weighted Correlation Network Analysis on high-dimensional data. Includes functions for rudimentary data cleaning, construction of correlation networks, module identification, summarization, and relating of variables and modules to sample traits. Also includes a number of utility functions for data manipulation and visualization.

bioschemas.name: WGCNA
